Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored a brace and assisted one goal.
Lautaro Martinez scored two goals, including a penalty.
Lisandro Martinez scored an own goal for Guatemala.
Nicholas Hagen's clearance error led to Messi's first goal.
Enzo Fernandez assisted Messi, who then set up Martinez for an easy finish.
Angel Di Maria assisted Messi's second goal with a delightful pass.
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni expressed disappointment over the early goal conceded but was pleased with the team's quick recovery and overall performance.
